title: All In
description: Book Four and the dénouement of the Winter Jacket Series.  Hollywood had been a disaster. Elle Graft—Associate Professor of English and once-budding television screenwriter—could admit that much. Now back in Minnesota and back to her old life, Elle’s determined to get her relationship with Hunter back on track.  It all started with a broken classroom heater and a blue winter coat. How will it end?
author: Eliza Lentzski
